Here's a interesting question:
Who would win in a fight?
OPM or Flandre Scarlet
The ability to destroy anything in one punch vs the little girl who can destroy anything with her mind but is too mentally immature to understand it.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55447e076368722e36461e00#post_55447e076368722e36461e00
Technically It's not the ability to destroy anything in one punch, He's just so strong that it doesn't really matter.

Really though, I think it could go either way. (If Saitama acts first, He'll probably win. If Flandre acts first, She'll probably win.)
